snippet.title: Abyss Crew - Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Abyss Crew is a 1 to 4 players co-op exploration videogame aboard a submarine, set in a steampunk universe.

Order the game on Steam now:

http://steam.abysscrew.com

Play as the Pilot, the Sonar, the Gunner, and the Engineer, on a local or online network. Stay sharp, keep a level head, coordinate with your crewmates, and make life-saving decisions in the dark depths of an unforgiving ocean...
Can your crew survive the Abyss? 

Join the community:
www.abysscrew.com
discord.abysscrew.com
twitter.abysscrew.com
facebook.abysscrew.com

Kickstarter campaign from 23d of February to 18th of March 2018:
www.kickstarter.com/projects/98046098/abyss-crew-a-coop-submarine-game
